text: Ludwig Koch is the name of: * Ludwig Koch (painter) (1866–1934), Austrian equestrian painter * Ludwig Carl Christian Koch (1825–1908), German entomologist and arachnologist * Ludwig Karl Koch (1881–1974), German-born British broadcaster and wildlife sound recordist * Ludwig Koch, father of kidnap victim Natascha Kampusch == See also == * Carl Ludwig Koch (1778-1857), German entomologist and arachnologist
title: Ludwig Koch
